text: Nottingham Forest F.C. is an English football club. They are based in Nottingham in the county of Nottinghamshire and started in 1865. They play their home matches at a stadium called 'City Ground'. Brian Clough was one of their managers and when he was in charge, Nottingham Forest won two European Cups and four League Cups. Since then they have dropped down to the 3rd division and back up to the second, they have had managers like Gary Megson, Joe Kinnear, David Platt and Frank Clark. They have no manager now. Their last one was Colin Calderwood. ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 First Division 11th 2001/02 First Division 16th 2002/03 First Division 6th 2003/04 First Division 14th 2004/05 League Championship 23rd 2005/06 League One 7th 2006/07 League One 4th 2007/08 League One 2nd 2008/09 League Championship 19th ===Former position=== Category:English football clubs Category:Nottingham Category:1865 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Nottingham Forest F.C.
